select shelf.sku, shelf.name, shelf.owner, sum(shelf.num) as num from l_up_shelf_product shelf
shelf.sku like CONCAT('%', #{sku}, '%')
or shelf.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
or shelf.owner like CONCAT('%', #{owner}, '%')
group by shelf.sku, shelf.name, shelf.owner

select shelf.sku, shelf.name, shelf.owner, sum(shelf.num) as num from l_up_shelf_product shelf where shelf.owner = #{username}
or shelf.sku like CONCAT('%', #{sku}, '%')
or shelf.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
group by shelf.sku, shelf.name, shelf.owner
